button.name: clear_web_cache
button.tool_tip: This option clears the last location, teleport history, web, and texture cache.
button.label: ⌊Clear History⌉

check_box.label: Show me in Search results
check_box.tool_tip: This options toggles whether your name should appear in the Second Life search for others to be found or not.
check_box.name: online_searchresults

check_box.label: Only friends and groups know I'm online
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether anyone outside of your joined groups or your friendlist can see your online status in your profile.
check_box.name: online_visibility

check_box.label: Only friends and groups can call or IM me
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether anyone outside of your joined groups or your friendlist can IM or call you.
check_box.name: voice_call_friends_only_check

check_box.label: Show my Favorite Landmarks at Login (via 'Start At' drop-down menu)
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether you want to show the favorite places from your last used account in the login panel 'Start Location' dropdown.
check_box.name: favorites_on_login_check

check_box.label: Private Snapshots (Quiet Snapshot to Disk)
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether you want the Viewer to allow playing a sound and animation to everyone whenever you take a snapshot.
check_box.name: QuietSnapshotsToDisk

check_box.label: Log in system chat whenever an inventory offer is declined
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether any declined inventory offers should be logged to the corresponding conversation tab or not.
check_box.name: log_inventory_chat

check_box.label: Show a part of the last conversation in history if available
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether a snipped of the last conversation should be displayed in a conversation tab.
check_box.name: log_show_history

radio_item.label: Nothing
radio_item.tool_tip: This option disables saving any logs or transcripts.
radio_item.name: Nothing

radio_item.label: Logs
radio_item.tool_tip: This option limits the Viewer to saving only logs of conversations.
radio_item.name: Logs

radio_item.label: Logs and Transcripts
radio_item.tool_tip: This option allows the Viewer to save all logs and transcripts of conversations.
radio_item.name: LogsTranscripts

button.tool_tip: This option sets the path all logs and transcripts should be saved to on your hard drive.
button.name: log_path_button

button.label: Clear
button.tool_tip: This option deletes all saved logs in the current log and transcript directory.
button.name: clear_log

button.label: Delete transcripts
button.tool_tip: This option deletes all saved transcripts saved in the current log and transcript directory.
button.name: delete_transcripts
